item.title: #en @ 1505331359866314753
item.description:
A friend let me know one of my Kaggle datasets showed up in @pbump's "How to Read This Chart" newsletter.
It's always great to learn about how open data is getting used once it's out there in the world. Like getting a postcard from an old friend. ğŸ˜

item.title: #en @ 1504654604079820800
item.description:
I don't like the assertion against open data that "such data should only be accessed by those with credentials".
That asserts that the public doesn't have academics, scientists, & professionals to contextualize open data.
That is asserting that the public is dumb.
